name: bitwarden
title: Bitwarden Vault
description: Access a Bitwarden account. Requires installing the Bitwarden CLI.
author: jomifepe

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Vault
commands.subtitle: Bitwarden
commands.description: Search all items in the authenticated Bitwarden vault.

preferences.name: primaryAction
preferences.description: The primary action to perform on a vault item.
preferences.title: Primary Password Action

preferences.name: transientCopySearch
preferences.title: Copy Values Temporarily
preferences.description: Whether values should be copied to the clipboard temporarily, and therefore omitted from the clipboard history

preferences.name: shouldCacheVaultItems
preferences.title: Improved Load Times
preferences.label: Enable Caching
preferences.description: Whether to cache vault items for faster access. This will NOT cache the actual passwords and other sensitive values, only usernames/emails and other labels.

preferences.name: transientCopyGeneratePassword
preferences.title: Copy Values Temporarily
preferences.description: Whether values should be copied to the clipboard temporarily, and therefore omitted from the clipboard history

commands.name: generate-password-quick
commands.title: Generate Password (Quick)
commands.subtitle: Bitwarden
commands.description: Generate a password using Bitwarden and copy and/or paste it into the active app right away.

preferences.name: generatePasswordQuickAction
preferences.title: Action to perform after generating
preferences.description: The action performed after generating the password.

data.title: Copy and Paste to Active App

preferences.name: transientCopyGeneratePasswordQuick
preferences.title: Copy Values Temporarily
preferences.description: Whether values should be copied to the clipboard temporarily, and therefore omitted from the clipboard history

commands.name: logout-vault
commands.title: Logout
commands.subtitle: Bitwarden
commands.description: Logout from your bitwarden vault account

preferences.name: clientId
preferences.title: Client ID
preferences.description: The client_id value seen in the My Account section of a Bitwarden web vault.

preferences.name: clientSecret
preferences.title: Client Secret
preferences.description: The client_secret value seen in the My Account section of a Bitwarden web vault.

preferences.name: repromptIgnoreDuration
preferences.title: Vault Timeout
preferences.description: The amount of time before the password must be re-entered to access the vault again.

preferences.name: fetchFavicons
preferences.title: Privacy
preferences.label: Fetch Vault Items Icons
preferences.description: Whether to use a remote service owned by Bitwarden to fetch icons for vault items. If unchecked, built-in icons will be used.

preferences.name: cliPath
preferences.title: Bitwarden CLI Installation Path
preferences.description: Location of the local Bitwarden CLI installation. Defaults to '/usr/local/bin/bw' on Intel and '/opt/homebrew/bin/bw' on M1.

preferences.name: serverUrl
preferences.title: Bitwarden Server URL
preferences.description: Optional: URL to use for self-hosted servers.

preferences.name: serverCertsPath
preferences.title: Self-signed Certificates Path
preferences.description: Advanced: Path to self-signed TLS certificate for self-hosted instances.

preferences.name: windowActionOnCopy
preferences.title: Window Behaviour On Copy
preferences.description: What to do with the window when copying a value to the clipboard.
